  • Constructor Details

    • SessionController

      private SessionController()
      Private constructor for the SessionController, initializes repositories.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SessionController getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the SessionController.
      Returns:
      The single instance of the SessionController.

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser(User user)
      Sets the current logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be set as the current user.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is null.

    • clearCurrentUser

      public void clearCurrentUser()
      Clears the current user, effectively logging them out.

    • login

      public boolean login(String hospitalId, String password)
      Attempts to log in a user using their hospital ID and password.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The hospital ID of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, false otherwise.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the current user by clearing the current user session.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Retrieves the current logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The current logged-in user, or null if no user is logged in.

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Checks if there is a user currently logged in.
      Returns:
      true if a user is logged in, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentUserRole

      public UserRole getCurrentUserRole()
      Retrieves the role of the current logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The role of the current user (Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist, Administrator), or null if no user is logged in.

    • isUserAuthorized

      public boolean isUserAuthorized(UserRole requiredRole)
      Checks if the current user has the required role.
      Parameters:
      requiredRole - The role to check for.
      Returns:
      true if the current user has the required role, false otherwise.

    • validateSession

      public boolean validateSession()
      Validates the session of the current user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is logged in and exists in the repository, false otherwise.

    • refreshCurrentUser

      public void refreshCurrentUser()
      Refreshes the current user's data from the repository to ensure they are up-to-date. If the user no longer exists in the repository, the session is cleared.
